hero.heading:
Drink Healthy
and Natural Coffee
hero.subtext: At Anu's House of Coffee ,we only brew the freshest coffee from all around the world. We also serve pastries such as cupcakes and brownies

about.heading: Welcome to Anu's Coffee House
about.subtext: Welcome to our house of coffee! We hope you enjoy our broad selection of premium coffee from all over the world

members.name: Anu
members.quote: Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and Consonantia, there live the blind texts.
